channel.title: Can eclipse crash while server running on it
channel.description: Hello basic question if I run my server on eclipse can it crash or is it stable to run it on there without a auto restarted. Just wondering. Thanks james.

item.title: Can eclipse crash while server running on it
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Justin Bieber, post:4, topic:551518”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670433.msg4483099#msg4483099 date=1431665693]
Yes. Your server can crash. It will not crash eclipse, though. It will report whatever error (Assuming it’s not caught already) in the console.
[/quote]??[/quote]
I was answering his question…
Eclipse won’t crash unless your computer is a dinosaur. Or, like me, when executing some projects it takes up all the heap space (Which you can fix by changing the settings of eclipse).
Your server can crash though… And if you have it caught with a try-catch, it may not print to the console… But if you don’t, it will print.

Read full topic
item.source: Can eclipse crash while server running on it

item.title: Can eclipse crash while server running on it
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Eclipse won’t crash unless your computer is good enough to handle resources.
Your server won’t crash if you spent some time and effort to your code.

Read full topic

item.title: Can eclipse crash while server running on it
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

If it can crash in the console it can crash in eclipse. Eclipse wont auto-restart it for you, though…
